function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective air mixing in patient rooms","Impact":"Higher risk of infectious particle concentration in the lower room","Mitigation":"Implementing mechanical ventilation systems and mixing fans to improve air mixing","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation systems, mixing fans","People":"Room occupants, health care workers","Owner":"Facility management, health care institutions"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of upper-room UV in protecting health care workers from airborne infection","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne infection for health care workers in close proximity","Mitigation":"Conducting controlled studies to evaluate the effect of upper-room UV on human-to-human TB transmission","Technologies":"Upper-room UV, controlled study protocols","People":"Health care workers, researchers","Owner":"Health care institutions, research institutions"},{"Description":"Adverse effect of increasing relative humidity on UV germicidal efficacy","Impact":"Decreased effectiveness of UV germicidal treatment with increasing relative humidity","Mitigation":"Monitoring and controlling relative humidity levels to stay within optimal range for UV germicidal efficacy","Technologies":"Humidity monitoring systems, dehumidifiers","People":"Facility management, maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management, maintenance department"}]}
